snippet: Edward Watts, who played the dual roles of Robert Semple and David Hutton in the recent Broadway musical "Scandalous," will portray Superman and Clark Kent in the Encores! revival of "It's a Bird   It's a Plane   It's Superman."
abstract: Edward Watts, who played the dual roles of Robert Semple and David Hutton in the recent Broadway musical "Scandalous," will portray Superman and Clark Kent in the Encores! revival of "It's a Bird   It's a Plane   It's Superman."

headline.main: It's a Bird, It's a Plane, It's a Dirty Blond: Musical Revival Casts Its 'Superman'

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Encores! Great American Musicals in Concert (Series)
